content: Just landed in NYC from Japan. Culture shock: from zen temples to Manhattan madness. Now, how do I fit a samurai sword in my shoebox apartment?
raw_content: Just touched down in NYC after an epic journey in Japan. The culture shock is real - from serene temples to the bustling streets of Manhattan! I've learned so much, and now I'm buzzing with ideas for my cultural exchange event. But first, I need to figure out how to fit my samurai sword in my tiny NYC apartment... 🗽🗾 #culturalexchange #backtoreality
